page.title: 14STANDARD TELEPHONE CABLES
page.content: S.T.C. is situated all over the country.It moved to Paignton to help alleviate unemployment.Since March 1957,their workforce has increased to 2,200 people. S.T.C. manufacture electronic componants which are sold world wide. Most people work a normal day shift 8.00am _ 5.00pm.However,a few people work a night shift(6.00am _ 2.00pm / 10.00pm _ 8.00am)and a few work a three shift system. It has its own purpose built training centre which is responsible for about 70 people who attend University and Colleges(full and part_time training). They have a social club situated nearby providing many recreational activities. The site is expanding with a large building under construction. By Joanna,Rachel and Louise.
